name: MID
description:
MID:

   W
A S D:  movement (will change if you change dimensions)

Left click:  rocket (you only have 6!!)

Right click: phase wave (will switch dimension for any hit enemy)
 
X: Phase switch. It can only be used when there are no enemies left on your dimension. When switching phase, rockets and health wil recharge.

 
Enemies will spawn by rounds. You have to finish enemies in all dimensions to end the round.
        

Enemies will be stronger when switched from dimension.

Programming ------------------ Cristobal Herrero Iglesias ------- @MakG2nd  

Model & design ---------------- Erick Daniel López Rodríguez -- @TimeliveC
 
Programming & sound ------- Pablo Arévalo González (me) ---- @pabloarev
